assessment_item.subject: Botany
assessment_item.title: LAAPAR-Q9-நைட்ரஜனை நிலைப்படுத்துவதற்கு தேவைப்படும் நொதி?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

நைட்ரஜனை நிலைப்படுத்துவதற்கு தேவைப்படும் நொதி?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

 நைட்ரஜன் டிஅமினேஸ்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:6379"},{"text":"

நைட்ரோ டை ஆக்ஸிடேஸ்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:6380"},{"text":"

அமினோ அமில டிகார்பாக்ஸிலேஸ்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:6390"},{"text":"

நைட்ரோஜினேஸ்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:6395"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LAAPAR-Q9-நைட்ரஜனை நிலைப்படுத்துவதற்கு தேவைப்படும் நொதி?","title":"LAAPAR-Q9-நைட்ரஜனை நிலைப்படுத்துவதற்கு தேவைப்படும் நொதி?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"MEDIUM","contentType":"Resource","mimeType":"application/vnd.ekstep.ecml-archive","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
